overview.useCase: Financial automation - QuickBooks journal entry synchronization to regional accounting systems
overview.value: Streamline multi-regional financial operations by automating journal entry transfers
overview.pain: Manual journal entry transfer between QuickBooks and regional accounting systems
overview.solution: Make.com Enterprise with On-Premise Agent + Custom API layer for Sage 50 Spain

challenges: Legacy System: Sage 50 Spain is Windows-only, file-based
No Standard API: Requires €1,500 SDK license for custom development
Regional Specificity: Spain version different from UK/US Sage 50
On-Premise Requirements: Security-conscious financial services client
Custom Integration Pattern: API + Make.com HTTP Agent + On-Prem Agent
requirements: ODBC for data retrieval + COM objects for data creation
